superheroes.name: Superman
superheroes.description: Superman is the last surviving Kryptonian, possessing incredible superhuman abilities that he uses to protect the people of Earth.

superheroes.name: Spider-Man
superheroes.description: Spider-Man is a friendly neighborhood superhero known for his agility, web-slinging, and incredible reflexes.

superheroes.name: Wonder Woman
superheroes.description: Wonder Woman is an Amazonian warrior princess with god-like strength and the Lasso of Truth, dedicated to justice and peace.

superheroes.name: Iron Man
superheroes.description: Iron Man, with his advanced powered armor, is a genius inventor and a charismatic billionaire philanthropist.

superheroes.name: Captain America
superheroes.description: Captain America is a super-soldier with an unbreakable shield, representing American ideals and defending freedom.

superheroes.name: Wonder Man
superheroes.description: Wonder Man possesses superhuman strength and energy powers, making him a valuable member of The Avengers.

superheroes.name: Black Widow
superheroes.description: Black Widow is a highly trained spy and martial artist, known for her combat skills and intelligence.

superheroes.name: Green Lantern
superheroes.description: Green Lantern wields a power ring that can create energy constructs and is part of an intergalactic police force.

superheroes.name: Storm
superheroes.description: Storm is a mutant with the power to control the weather, often serving as a leader of the X-Men.
